China:
Goguryeo conquered and annexed the Lelang Commandery.
Huai was executed.
Huai's nephew Emperor Min of Jin became emperor of the Jin dynasty.
Germany: The  Roman Catholic Diocese of Cologne was founded.
Italy: Constantine the Great and Licinius issued the Edict of Milan, providing for restitution to Christians injured during the persecutions. Licinius married Constantia. Battle of Tzirallum: Licinius defeated a vastly numerically superior force loyal to Maximinus at modern Ã‡orlu. Maximinus fled to Nicomedia. Maximinus died at Tarsus.
